alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 9:51PM MST until December 29 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times through Midnight MST, then tapering off. Snow may mix with rain at times below 4500-5000 feet and will be all rain below 4000 feet. New snow accumulations generally ranging from 1 to 3 inches, with lesser amounts below 5000 feet and locally higher amounts above 6000 feet. * WHERE...Areas above 4500 feet near Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Slippery and snow covered roads could lead to very difficult travel across the high terrain. Patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility at times above 6000 feet. Additional snow forecast from 9 PM Today to 2 AM Wednesday: Payson 1 to 2 inches Pine-Strawberry 1 to 3 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
